channel.title: Countries on Help Missing
channel.description: Recent content in Countries on Help Missing

item.title: Australia
item.description:
Missing Persons Resources in Australia

  • Missing Persons Search
    Australian missing persons search database

  • Victoria Police Missing Persons
    Victoria Police missing persons list

  • NSW Police Missing Persons
    New South Wales Police missing persons search

  • Australian Missing Persons Register
    Comprehensive Australian missing persons register

  • Queensland Police Missing Persons
    Queensland Police missing persons information

item.title: Austria
item.description:
Missing Persons Resources in Austria

  • Österreich findet euch Missing Persons
    Austrian missing persons database and information platform

  • Meinbezirk Missing Persons Search
    Austrian regional news site with missing persons search and information

item.title: Brazil
item.description:
Missing Persons Resources in Brazil

  • Cadastro Nacional de Pessoas Desaparecidas
    National Registry of Missing Persons maintained by the Ministry of Justice and Public Security of Brazil.

  • Desaparecidos do Brasil
    Search database for missing persons in Brazil, maintained by a private organization.

  • Pessoas Desaparecidas no Estado do Paraná
    Missing persons database for the state of Paraná, maintained by the Paraná State Civil Police.

  • Desaparecidos - Polícia Civil RS
    Missing persons database for the state of Rio Grande do Sul, maintained by the Rio Grande do Sul State Civil Police.

item.title: Canada
item.description:
Missing Persons Resources in Canada

  • Canada’s Missing
    Government of Canada missing persons website

  • Missing People Canada Cold Cases
    Canadian missing persons cold cases database

  • Missing Child Canada
    Canadian missing children resource center

  • SACP Missing Persons
    Saskatchewan Association of Chiefs of Police missing persons database

  • Aboriginal Alert
    Alert system for missing Indigenous persons in Canada

  • MissingKids.ca Database
    Canadian Centre for Child Protection missing children database

  • Canada Unsolved
    Canadian unsolved cases and missing persons database

item.title: France
item.description:
Missing Persons Resources in France

  • 116000 Enfants Disparus
    French missing children hotline search notices

  • Personne Disparue
    French missing persons search database

  • Association pour la Recherche de Personnes Disparues
    French association for missing persons search

item.title: Germany
item.description:
Missing Persons Resources in Germany

  • Hesse State Police Missing Persons
    Hesse State Police missing persons database

  • North Rhine-Westphalia Police Missing Persons
    North Rhine-Westphalia Police missing persons search

  • Baden-Württemberg Police Missing Persons
    Baden-Württemberg Police missing persons database

  • Bavaria Police Missing Persons
    Bavaria Police missing persons database

  • Berlin Police Missing Persons
    Berlin Police missing persons reports

  • Brandenburg Police Missing Persons
    Brandenburg Police missing persons search

  • Bremen Police Missing Persons
    Bremen Police missing persons search

item.title: Hong Kong
item.description:
Missing Persons Resources in Hong Kong

  • Hong Kong Police Missing Persons
    Hong Kong Police Force missing persons appeals and information

item.title: Ireland
item.description:
Missing Persons Resources in Ireland

  • Garda Missing Persons
    Garda Síochána missing persons information and appeals

item.title: Italy
item.description:
Missing Persons Resources in Italy

  • Italian Prefectures Missing Persons Database
    Italian prefectures missing persons database (historical site - may not be updated)

  • Penelope Italia Missing Persons Archive
    Penelope Italia missing persons archive and information

item.title: Netherlands
item.description:
Missing Persons Resources in the Netherlands

  • Dutch Police Missing Persons
    Official Dutch police missing persons database

  • Vermist Help de Politie
    Dutch police missing persons assistance platform

item.title: New Zealand
item.description:
Missing Persons Resources in New Zealand

  • New Zealand Police Missing Persons
    New Zealand Police missing persons list and information

item.title: Poland
item.description:
Missing Persons Resources in Poland

  • ITAKA Foundation - Missing Persons Database
    Polish foundation helping find missing people and unidentified persons

item.title: Portugal
item.description:
Missing Persons Resources in Portugal

  • Policia Judiciaria
    Official website of the Portuguese Judicial Police for missing persons reports and investigations.

item.title: Romania
item.description:
Missing Persons Resources in Romania

  • Romanian Police Missing Persons
    Romanian Police missing persons database and information

item.title: South Africa
item.description:
Missing Persons Resources in South Africa

  • SAPS Missing Persons
    South African Police Service missing persons database and crime stop information

item.title: Spain
item.description:
Missing Persons Resources in Spain

  • SOS Desaparecidos
    Spanish association for missing persons and unidentified remains

  • Centro Nacional de Desaparecidos
    Spanish National Center for Missing Persons

item.title: Switzerland
item.description:
Missing Persons Resources in Switzerland

  • Swiss Police Missing Persons
    Swiss police missing persons category and information

  • Polizeiticker Missing Persons
    Swiss police news ticker with missing persons reports and information

  • Bern Canton Police Wanted Persons
    Bern canton police wanted and missing persons database

  • Bern Canton Police Missing Persons Investigations
    Bern canton police missing persons investigations and cases

  • Valais Canton Police Missing Persons
    Valais canton police missing persons reports and information

  • 116000 Missing Children Hotline
    Swiss missing children hotline missing persons reporting and information

item.title: Turkey
item.description:
Missing Persons Resources in Turkey

  • Kayıp Arananlar - Emniyet Genel Müdürlüğü
    Official Turkish Police missing persons database, maintained by the Public Order Department.

item.title: United Kingdom
item.description:
Missing Persons Resources in the United Kingdom

  • Missing People
    UK charity helping find missing people

  • National Crime Agency Missing Persons Search
    National Crime Agency missing persons case search database

  • Police Scotland Missing Persons
    Police Scotland missing persons information and reports

  • PSNI Long-term Missing Persons
    Police Service of Northern Ireland long-term missing persons appeals

item.title: United States
item.description:
Missing Persons Resources in the United States

  • National Missing and Unidentified Persons System (NamUs)
    National system for missing, unidentified, and unclaimed persons

  • The Charley Project
    Online registry of missing persons cases and unidentified remains

  • The Doe Network
    Volunteer organization maintaining missing persons and unidentified remains databases

  • FBI Missing Persons
    FBI’s wanted persons and missing children

  • National Center for Missing & Exploited Children (NCMEC)
    Resources for missing and exploited children with search functionality
